subject: Tests (Drug Use)
Human Growth Hormone
Basketball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A.’s new collective bargaining agreement opens the door to blood testing for human growth hormone — provided that the league and its union can agree on the reliability of the test.
snippet: The N.B.A.’s new collective bargaining agreement opens the door to blood testing for human growth hormone — provided that the league and its union can agree on the reliability of the test.
